Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2013 12:37PM Chloesnana wrote: My last chemo was March 1st of this year. My daughter is a hair dresser and has me taking biotin every day. It seems to be helping because my hair and nailsÂ are growing really fast. I kept my eyebrows and eyelashes the whole time during chemo, however I am loosing both of them now. I'm not sure if that's the case with everyone, but it is for me. :( This past weekend I decided it was time to go with just a cute little bow on my head, no hat, no scarf just my bow. It was truly liberating. I felt free!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
